title: Red Giant Keying Suite 11.1.3 (Windows 64-bit) + SN
description:
Red Giant Keying Suite 11.1.3 (Windows 64-bit) + SN

Chroma Keying and Compositing tools

Red Giant Keying Suite is a set of 3 tools that make your keying seamless and build the realism of your shot -taking you from the initial matte to the final composite.

Included In Keying Suite 11.1.3

Primatte Keyer 5.1 - runs on After Effects + Premiere Pro CC (2015), CC (2014), CC, CS6

Fast, Automatic Chroma-keying, with Pro-level control and accuracy.

- Remove your green/blue-screen with the touch of a single button
- The best user experience with the best results
- Correct uneven lighting, remove spill, and fine tune the important details

Key Correct 1.3 - runs on After Effects + Premiere Pro CC (2015), CC (2014), CC, CS6

Compositing cleanup and enhancement.

- Keep your composites looking natural
- Improve results from popular keyers
- Fine-tune alphas, color-match foregrounds to backgrounds, and remove unwanted elements

Warp 1.1 - runs on After Effects + Premiere Pro CC (2015), CC (2014), CC, CS6, CS5.5, CS5

Shadows, reflections, glows, and corner pinning.

- Corner-pinning is easy with advanced After Effects integration
- Control perspective, falloff and more for reflections and shadows
- Now including 3 tools for unique glows and glimmers

Requirements

Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
64-bit Processor
4 GB of RAM

Homepage http://www.redgiant.com/products/keying-suite/
